perc_hh_with_broadband.long_description: Percentage of households self-reported to have a broadband internet connection. Broadband internet is defined as any type of internet other than a dial-up. Data is based on American Community Survey Table B28002 in ACS 2015/2019 5-year estimates. Geographies: County (5), Block group (12), Census Tract (11), Health District (51_hd)
perc_hh_with_broadband.short_description: Percentage of households self-reported to have a broadband internet connection. Broadband internet is defined as any type of internet other than a dial-up. Data is based on American Community Survey Table B28002 in ACS 2015/2019 5-year estimates. Geographies: County (5), Block group (12), Census Tract (11), Health District (51_hd)
perc_hh_with_broadband.statement: {value} of households in {features.name} have a broadband connection.

perc_hh_with_cable_fiber_dsl.long_description: Percentage of households self-reported to have a high-speed internet service. A high-speed internet service is defined as a cable, fiber optic, or DSL internet connection. Data is based on American Community Survey Table B28002 in ACS 2015/2019 5-year estimates. Geographies: County (5), Block group (12), Census Tract (11), Health Districts (51_hd)
perc_hh_with_cable_fiber_dsl.long_name: Percentage of households with a high speed internet service (cable, fiber optic, or DSL)
perc_hh_with_cable_fiber_dsl.short_description: Percentage of households self-reported to have a high-speed internet service. A high-speed internet service is defined as a cable, fiber optic, or DSL internet connection. Data is based on American Community Survey Table B28002 in ACS 2015/2019 5-year estimates. Geographies: County (5), Block group (12), Census Tract (11), Health Districts (51_hd)
perc_hh_with_cable_fiber_dsl.short_name: Households with cable, fiber optic, or DSL
perc_hh_with_cable_fiber_dsl.statement: {value} of households in {features.name} have a cable, fiber optic, or DSL internet connection.

perc_hh_without_internet.long_description: Percentage of households self-reported to not have internet access at home. Data is based on American Community Survey Table B28002 in ACS 2015/2019 5-year estimates. Geographies: County (5), Block group (12), Census Tract (11), Health District (51_hd)
perc_hh_without_internet.long_name: Percentage of households without internet access
perc_hh_without_internet.short_description: Percentage of households self-reported to not have internet access at home. Data is based on American Community Survey Table B28002 in ACS 2015/2019 5-year estimates. Geographies: County (5), Block group (12), Census Tract (11), Health District (51_hd)
perc_hh_without_internet.statement: {value} of households in {features.name} do not have internet access.
